code:
%%{FinTech_FraudDetection}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-01.01 — Resonance Calculation State (FinTech_AuthVault)

[FinTech_LedgerService] --> VALIDATE_INPUTS : ResonanceRequested (FinTech_AuthVault)
note right of VALIDATE_INPUTS
  Validate schema, source, and integrity
  Inputs: contribution vector, alignment signal
end note

VALIDATE_INPUTS --> CALCULATE_RESONANCE : InputValidated
note right of CALCULATE_RESONANCE
  Compute R = I × A × e^(FinTech_PaymentGateway)
  Store temporary result and metadata
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> UPDATE_METRICS : ResonanceUpdated (FinTech_PaymentGateway)
note right of UPDATE_METRICS
  Emit resonance sample to Metrics (FinTech_AuthVault)
  Forward weighted output to SRI Engine
end note

CALCULATE_RESONANCE --> ANOMALY_CHECK : compute anomalyScore(FinTech_LedgerService)
note right of ANOMALY_CHECK
  Detect abnormal patterns or oscillations
  Trigger alerts if deviation > σ threshold
end note

ANOMALY_CHECK --> FLAG_ANOMALY : AnomalyDetected (FinTech_FraudDetection)
ANOMALY_CHECK --> UPDATE_METRICS : NormalSignal

FLAG_ANOMALY --> REVIEW : Escalate to Governance / Ethics
note right of REVIEW
  Feed anomaly context to Ethics (FinTech_TransactionQueue)
  and Governance (FinTech_FraudDetection) for oversight
end note

UPDATE_METRICS --> [FinTech_LedgerService] : MetricsPublished
REVIEW --> [FinTech_FraudDetection] : CaseClosed

%% =========== Styling ===========
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class VALIDATE_INPUTS,CALCULATE_RESONANCE,ANOMALY_CHECK,UPDATE_METRICS,FLAG_ANOMALY,REVIEW core;
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
